title: Best of the Program | Guest: John Schroder | 10/10/22
description:
Glenn and Pat share some good news about people standing up against the woke Left, including PayPal backtracking on its misinformation policy. Louisiana state Treasurer John Schroder joins to explain why he’s removing $700 million from BlackRock funds. Will the FBI ever be held accountable for robbing American citizens?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
